name: places/ChIJMaJebJ1ZwokRcfceE3hSYuM
formattedAddress: 236 E 82nd St #1F, New York, NY 10028, USA
adrFormatAddress: 236 E 82nd St #1F, New York, NY 10028, USA

originalText.text: I had a shamanic healing session. I didn’t know what to expect at all and was slightly nervous. I’m an observer in new situations and kind of quiet but she handled that well. She informed me on what I needed to know and by request she also guided me through the whole process. I felt at ease by the end of the session.  It is a very warm environment and I will be returning again.

originalText.text:
I have been to Satori Holistic for more than a year.
Anjali is compassionate attentive in understanding what is needing for each session. Recently I have been using Acpuncture and different methods of healing from Anjali.
One of the methods is tuning forks. I usually have a tuning fork session after acpuncture. When I get a tuning fork session I feel my vibration rising with every sound and vibration with the energy in my body. I honestly feel it for days after. One week I have acpuncture with tuning fork. The next session I have Acpuncture and Mayan massage. Depending on how I am feeling Anjali helps me with my well being.
Took forward to my sessions with Anjali. I have learned to listen to my body and energy. I share with Anjali what is happening before acpuncture and she leads me to what method is best to meet for the session to release my stress.
I love how knowledgeable, supportive and versatile
Anjali is.
Anjali is first and foremost ready to hear and help in anyways through any of her expertise.
Anjali is an amazing person. She is down to earth, loving, caring, compassionate, meets you where your energy is, and she asks the questions to get to the root. I recommend Satori Holistic with Anjali!
She is phenomenal!

Best
Holly

originalText.text: Anjali is very knowledgeable, attentive and thorough. I felt the Accupuncture treatment working while still on the table - my anxiety levels dropped and I felt a lot more present in my body. Arvego abdominal massage was very nourishing and included a detailed educational part, so I actually learnt a very useful tool for my daily self-care practice.

originalText.text: The location I visited was on the upper East side of the city. And the service itself was relaxing. But I didn't feel any sense of welcome, customer service, greeting, it was very bizarre. I prefer environments and clinicians that express warmth & care in their service and manner. I don't think I'll be returning.

text.text: The location I visited was on the upper East side of the city. And the service itself was relaxing. But I didn't feel any sense of welcome, customer service, greeting, it was very bizarre. I prefer environments and clinicians that express warmth & care in their service and manner. I don't think I'll be returning.

originalText.text: Love getting acupuncture from Anjali! I've had multiple practitioners and she is the best. I once had a painful ganglion cyst on my hand that MDs told me I had to get surgery for. Three acupuncture treatments with Anjali and it was gone. Her other services are mind-blowing as well. Try the acupuncture/reiki combo!

text.text: Love getting acupuncture from Anjali! I've had multiple practitioners and she is the best. I once had a painful ganglion cyst on my hand that MDs told me I had to get surgery for.
